# Just trying out a simple null model

```{r packagesanddata}

rm(list=ls())

library(tidyverse)

ind_data <- read_csv("./data/GRSM/GRSM_individual.csv")

daily_data <- read_csv("./data/GRSM/GRSM_daily.csv") %>% 
  filter(!is.na(gcc_90))

target_data <- read_csv("./data/GRSM/GRSM_gccTargets.csv") %>% 
  filter(!is.na(gcc_90))

```

# simple LM
```{r simplelm}

lm1 <- lm(gcc_90 ~ max_solar_elev + doy,data=daily_data)
summary(lm1)  

predict_df <- daily_data %>% 
  select(max_solar_elev,doy,gcc_90)

predict_df$new_gcc <- predict(object = lm1,newdata = predict_df)

ggplot(data = predict_df,aes(x=doy,y=new_gcc))+
  #geom_point(aes(y=gcc_90),color='grey',alpha=0.5)+
  geom_line()+
  theme_classic()


```
